00003 BrisaMulticastEventReceiver::BrisaMulticastEventReceiver(QObject *parent) :
00004         QObject(parent)
00005 {
00006     this->udpListener = new BrisaUdpListener("239.255.255.246", 7900,
00007                                        "BrisaMulticastEventReceiver",
00008                                        parent);
00009     connect(this->udpListener, SIGNAL(readyRead()), this, SLOT(read()));
00010 }

00014     delete this->udpListener;
00015 }

00017 void BrisaMulticastEventReceiver::start()
00018 {
00019     this->udpListener->start();
00020 }
00021 
00022 void BrisaMulticastEventReceiver::read()
00023 {
00024     while (this->udpListener->hasPendingDatagrams()) {
00025         this->message.resize(udpListener->pendingDatagramSize());
00026         this->udpListener->readDatagram(this->message.data(), this->message.size());
00027         formatMessage();
00028     }
00029 }
00030 
00031 void BrisaMulticastEventReceiver::formatMessage()
00032 {
00033     QString newMessage = QString(message);
00034     QString header = "";
00035     QString body = "";
00036     QString temp;
00037     int i = 0;
00038     while (i < newMessage.size()) {
00039         temp = "";
00040         do {
00041             temp.append(newMessage[i]);
00042             i++;
00043         } while (!temp.endsWith("\r\n"));
00044         if (temp == "\r\n") {
00045             break;
00046         }
00047         header.append(temp);
00048     }
00049     if (i == newMessage.size()) {
00050         qWarning() << "Bad formated multicast message!";
00051         return;
00052     }
00053     QHttpRequestHeader requestHeader(header);
00054     bool castOk = 0;
00055     const int length = requestHeader.value("CONTENT-LENGTH").toInt(&castOk);
00056     if (!castOk) {
00057         qWarning() << "CONTENT-LENGTH is not ok on multicast message.";
00058         return;
00059     }
00060     for (; i < newMessage.size(); i++) {
00061         body.append(newMessage[i]);
00062     }
00063     if (length != body.size()) {
00064         qWarning() << "Value for CONTENT-LENGTH is wrong.";
00065         return;
00066     }
00067     this->attributes["USN"] =  requestHeader.value("USN");
00068     this->attributes["SVCID"] = requestHeader.value("SVCID");
00069     this->attributes["NT"] = requestHeader.value("NT");
00070     this->attributes["NTS"] = requestHeader.value("NTS");
00071     this->attributes["SEQ"] = requestHeader.value("SEQ");
00072     this->attributes["LVL"] = requestHeader.value("LVL");
00073     //TODO: use BOOTID.UPNP.ORG
00074 //    this->attributes["BOOTID.UPNP.ORG"] = requestHeader.value("BOOTID.UPNP.ORG");
00075     parseBody(body.toUtf8());
00076     emit multicastReceived(attributes);
00077 }
00078 
00079 void BrisaMulticastEventReceiver::parseBody(QByteArray body)
00080 {
00081     QDomDocument doc("body");
00082     body.replace(":e", "");
00083     doc.setContent(body);
00084     QString xmlns = doc.documentElement().attribute("xmlns");
00085     QDomNode node = doc.documentElement().firstChild().firstChild();
00086     QString variableName = node.toElement().tagName();
00087     QString newValue = node.toElement().text();
00088     this->attributes["xmlns"] = xmlns;
00089     this->attributes["variableName"] = variableName;
00090     this->attributes["newValue"] = newValue;
00091 }
